comments: While other professors talk theory and ideas, this professor shows us what she actually does in her classroom. She pushes her students to work hard, but is proud and excited when students meet their potential. She is one of the best professors I\'ve ever had!

I really liked this teacher. She was nice, fun and energetic. She understands what it is like to be a student. She is great and teachers the class with a real understanding of students needs as well as ideal experience of the teaching world.
